requirement.topic: The xmlBlaster.properties file allows you to use and define some helpful variables
requirement.description: The xmlBlaster.properties file allows to customize the behavior of xmlBlaster. See the example below.
requirement.example:
The variables $user.dir $user.home may be used and will be replaced to the current directory and the users home directory respectively.
You may set $XMLBLASTER_HOME in your JVM environment or here, e.g. $XMLBLASTER_HOME=$user.home/xmlBlaster and use it as a variable in this file.
